name: Aeros Flight Training
about: Aeros Flight Training, established in 1986, is the UKâ€™s leading modular flight training school with bases in Cardiff, Coventry, Gloucester, Wellesbourne, and Doncaster. We take students from zero experience to airline employment-ready in as little as 18 months, offering courses for both novice and experienced pilots, including CPL and MCC/JOC. Our academies are open 7 days a week, providing one-to-one instruction tailored to individual needs, with a 100% first series pass rate. Our graduates fly for major airlines such as British Airways, Emirates, and Ryanair. With a commitment to safety and excellence, we help students achieve their aviation dreams efficiently and safely.
